description: Item can detect any special purpose foes within 60 feet
Item can cast GET_SPELL_LEVEL_4 at will
Wielder gets +2 luck bonus on attacks, saves, and checks
Item can cast GET_SPELL_LEVEL_5 at will
Item can cast GET_SPELL_LEVEL_6 at will
Item can cast GET_SPELL_LEVEL_7 at will
Item can cast true resurrection on weilder, once per month
